summary: "The Mummy" is a 1999 American action-adventure film directed by Stephen Sommers. It stars Brendan Fraser as Rick O'Connell, a treasure hunter who, along with librarian Evelyn Carnahan and her brother Jonathan, accidentally awakens Imhotep, a powerful cursed priest, in the City of the Dead. The movie was a remake of the 1932 film and took years to develop. Filming was challenging, happening in Morocco and the UK, with desert hardships. Visual effects by Industrial Light & Magic combined live-action and CGI. Despite mixed reviews, it was a box office hit, earning over $416 million. Its success led to two sequels and various spin-offs.
title: The Mummy (1999 film)
